name: Formica
description:
Grow your colony to 1000 ants by feeding your queen and larvae, guiding your ants, and dealing with threats!

  • Place pheromones to guide your ants
  • Collect powerups
  • Fight or avoid fire ants, spiders and beetles
  • Complete the list of achievements

Minimum Specs:
CPU: Quad Core 3.5ghz (Ryzen 3 1300X, i3 8100)
GPU: Geforce MX 250 / Radeon RX 550
RAM: 4GB

Recommended Specs:
CPU: Hexacore Core 4ghz (Ryzen 5 3500, i5 10400)
GPU: Geforce GTX 1650 / Radeon RX 580
RAM: 8GB
